tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE PatientOutcomes (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    treatment_date DATE,
    outcome_score INT
)

CREATE TABLE Treatments ( 
	treatment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
	patient_id UUID REFERENCES Patients(patient_id), 
	treatment_name STRING, 
	reatment_effectiveness FLOAT, 
	treatment_date DATE 
);

CREATE TABLE Patients (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(50),
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    age INT,
    admission_date DATE,
    discharge_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE Treatments (
    treatment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    treatment_name VARCHAR(50),
    cost DECIMAL(10, 2),
    effectiveness_rating INT,
    patient_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patients(patient_id)
)

CREATE TABLE Outcomes (
    outcome_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    outcome_description TEXT,
    outcome_date DATE,
    patient_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patients(patient_id)
)

CREATE TABLE Patients (
    patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(50),
    date_of_birth DATE,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    height FLOAT,
    weight FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE Treatments (
    treatment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    treatment_name VARCHAR(50),
    cost DECIMAL(10, 2),
    duration INT,
    effectiveness_score FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE Visits (
    visit_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id UUID REFERENCES Patients(patient_id),
    visit_date DATE,
    doctor_name VARCHAR(50),
    diagnosis VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE Outcomes (
    outcome_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    visit_id UUID REFERENCES Visits(visit_id),
    outcome_description TEXT,
    outcome_type VARCHAR(20),
    recovery_status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE Patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(100),
  date_of_birth DATE,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  address VARCHAR(200)
);

CREATE TABLE Visits (
  visit_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  visit_date DATE,
  doctor_id INT,
  diagnosis VARCHAR(200),
  CONSTRAINT fk_patient_id FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patients(patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Outcomes (
  outcome_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  visit_id INT,
  outcome_description TEXT,
  effectiveness_score DECIMAL(5, 2),
  CONSTRAINT fk_visit_id FOREIGN KEY (visit_id) REFERENCES Visits(visit_id)
);
